3837    <div class="form-group">
39            <p class="font-small">To get an Access to Work grant you must be:</p><ul class="list-bullet">
40 <li>16 or over</li>
41 <li>have a disability that makes it difficult for you to do your current job or a job you're about to start</li>
42 <li>live and work in England, Scotland or Northern Ireland</li>
43 </ul>
44       <p class="font-small">You might not be eligible if you already get one or more of the following:</p>
45 <ul class="list-bullet">
46 <li>Employment and Support Allowance</li>
47 <li>Incapacity Benefit</li>
48  <li>Income Support</li>
49    <li>severe disability allowance</li>
50 </ul>

41           <h2 class="heading-medium">Next</h2>
42          
43           <p>An Access to Work adviser will be contacting you before next Tuesday.</p>
44          
45           <h2 class="heading-medium">After that</h2>
46          
47           <p>An assessment at your place of work may then be necessary which will happen during the following ten days.</p>
36       <h2 class="heading-medium">What happens next</h2>
37      
38       <p>You or your representative (if you gave one) will get a phone call or email before next Tuesday to discuss your application further.</p>
39      
40       <p>If an assessor needs to see you at your workplace, you'll be told when this will happen.</p>
41      
42       <p>You'll get a decision letter within another 10 days.</p>

55 <div class="intro-content">
56    <h2 class="heading-medium">1. Overview</h2>
57    <p>You can apply for an Access to Work grant if you have a disability or health condition that makes it difficult for you to work.</p>
58    <p>The money is to pay for <a href="intro3">practical support</a> to help you: </p>
59    
60    <ul class="list-bullet">
61      <li>start working</li>
62      <li>keep working if you already have a job</li>
63      <li>get to and from work</li>
64      <li>move into self-employment or start a business</li>
65    </ul>
66    <p>The grant is not for business start-up costs.</p>
67    
68    <p>The money doesn’t have to be paid back and doesn't affect other benefits.</p>
69
